content: a sweet rainbow delight that is simple to make with just 1 cake of lion brand mandala or mandala baby yarn show off the colors of your favorite self-striping or gradient yarn and make a quick gift for a baby or child youtube introduction and tutorials https //youtube com/playlist list=plvwlqaeek-md6cspqk-zypahsujtmemgj&si=ensikaiecmiomare 1 this is an easy beginner level pattern that requires only chain and double_crochet stitches in us terms the pattern has photos for the basic technique and how to attach the optional popsicle stick the pattern includes instructions for two sizes **small** for a baby or child suitable for kids up to about age 6 as a car seat or stroller blanket or cuddle blanket at home 25 wide 33 5 long 63 5 cm wide by 85 cm long not including the optional stick small size requires about 590 yards 540 m of dk weight yarn the optional stick to turn the blanket into a popsicle/ice pop/paleta requires about 60 yards 55 m of tan/camel/taupe colored yarn the small sample blanket used 1 cake of lion brand mandala baby yarn in the acre woods colorway and bernat baby sport yarn in baby taupe for the stick **large** for a child or adult lap blanket 33 wide 50 long 84 cm wide by 127 cm long not including the optional stick large size requires about 1 180 yards 1 080 m of dk weight yarn the optional stick to turn the blanket into a popsicle/ice pop/paleta requires about 110 yards 101 m of tan/camel/taupe colored yarn the large sample blanket used 2 cakes of lion brand mandala baby yarn in the arendelle colorway you can use any yarn weight you like use the hook size recommended on the yarn label because the blanket is worked from the center out toward the edges you can stop whenever your blanket is large enough here is the introduction video on youtube that describes the sizes yarn requirements and technique https //www youtube com/watch v=qgcmkrd1v3a tutorial video coming soon subscribe to pretty peaceful s youtube channel here https //www
